title: Mola, 20th century
dimensions: H x W: 73 x 66 cm (28 3/4 in. x 26 in.)
description: Woman's blouse with short sleeves. The top part is made of a figured white cotton and trimmed with bands of small-patterned printed cotton. Deep border of appliqué in red and blue-green on a ground of pinkish-orange. Pattern in two rows of highly stylized forms suggested a plant.

tombstone.epitaph:
Mola, 20th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: reverse appliqué. 1966-93-1.
